TransactionStateContext.DepositState: When users deposit Ether into the contract using the Deposit function or by directly sending Ether to the contract.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: When users attempt to withdraw Ether using the Collect function, which checks the user's balance and conditions for withdrawal.

ExternalInteractions: The contract interacts with an external LogFile contract to log transactions.
Ether transfers occur when users deposit or withdraw funds.
